<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1916</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Harry Potter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Harry Töpfer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Harry Traînent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potter De Harry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vasaio Del Harry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Χαρρυ Potter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Potter De Harry</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for intermmediate English students, where the student answers questions about the book, Harry Potter, its author, and then writes a summary of the book.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Novels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">authors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Harry Potter</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für intermmediate 
englische Kursteilnehmer, in denen der Kursteilnehmer Fragen über das
Buch beantwortet, Harry Töpfer, sein Autor und schreibt dann eine 
Zusammenfassung des Buches.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais d'intermmediate, où l'étudiant répond à des 
questions au sujet du livre, Harry Traînent, son auteur, et 
puis écrivent un sommaire du livre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses do intermmediate, onde o estudante responde a 
perguntas sobre o livro, potter de Harry, seu autor, e escreve então 
um sumário do livro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi del intermmediate, in cui l'allievo risponde alle 
domande circa il libro, vasaio del Harry, il relativo autore ed allora
scrive un sommario del libro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές intermmediate, όπου ο σπουδαστής 
απαντά στις ερωτήσεις για το βιβλίο, Harry Potter, ο 
συντάκτης του, και γράφει έπειτα μια περίληψη του βιβλίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses del intermmediate, donde el estudiante contesta a
preguntas sobre el libro, potter de Harry, su autor, y entonces 
escribe un resumen del libro.</string>
          </description>
